title: The Unwanted Affair
description: Chelsea is the best friend a girl could have. Kind, caring, selfless, she gives far more than she ever asks for, but one regrettable act leads to a series of traumatic events that change everything she believes about herself and the people in her life.As she silently struggles to move forward and forget about the pain sheâ€™s suffered, she meets a man who steals her heart, but fear and a new round of troubling events threatens to hold her back once again.How much more can Chelsea take before she breaks?
author: Jillian Behrz
